author: felicity
msg: bug 2869: sa-learn would fail if run with --mbox and reading from STDIN in certain circumstances.  this commit lets sa-learn make a temp file to store the contents from STDIN, runs the appropriate code over the temp file, then removes it.

author: felicity
msg: the loop should deal with the file name, not the folder name ...
